mapper.select: SELECT RED_1, RED_2, RED_3, RED_4, RED_5, RED_6 FROM BALL_RED_FILTER
mapper.insert:
insert into BALL_RED_FILTER (RED_1, RED_2, RED_3, RED_4, RED_5, RED_6) values
